brutalist.label: Brutalist Bold
brutalist.description: High-contrast slabs, unapologetic typography, and industrial borders.
brutalist.ui_accents: thick borders, stark boxes, asymmetric layout
brutalist.instructions: Use high-contrast blocks, unapologetically large typography, and minimal gradients.
brutalist.image_prompt: brutalist architecture inspired website art, sharp contrast lighting
brutalist.preview_copy: Massive geometry, unapologetic contrast, confident storytelling.

editorial.label: Editorial Luxe
editorial.description: Magazine-inspired typography with refined spacing and gold accents.
editorial.ui_accents: generous whitespace, split layouts, illustrated drop caps
editorial.instructions: Emphasize large serif headlines, slim rules, and luxe editorial callouts.
editorial.image_prompt: editorial magazine layout with gold accents, soft lighting

neomorphism.label: Neo-morphism Glow
neomorphism.description: Soft layered cards, pill buttons, and gentle gradients with tactile depth.
neomorphism.ui_accents: pill buttons, floating cards, diffused drop shadows
neomorphism.instructions: Use layered cards with soft drop shadows, rounded corners, and gentle gradients.
neomorphism.image_prompt: neumorphic interface render, glowing buttons, soft focus

vaporwave.label: Vaporwave Neon
vaporwave.description: Dreamy retro grids, neon gradients, and chrome-glitch UI flourishes.
vaporwave.instructions: Lean into nostalgic 80s neon, grain overlays, and playful glitch dividers.
vaporwave.image_prompt: vaporwave cityscape, neon gradients, retro futurism

high_contrast_minimal.label: High-Contrast Minimal
high_contrast_minimal.description: Surgical spacing, monochrome surfaces, and one bold accent hue.
high_contrast_minimal.ui_accents: razor-thin rules, monochrome cards, surgical spacing
high_contrast_minimal.instructions: Stick to monochrome planes with one punchy accent and crisp modular spacing.
high_contrast_minimal.image_prompt: monochrome fashion layout with vibrant accent line

artisan.label: Warm Artisan
artisan.description: Handcrafted storytelling with textured layers and warm film tones.
artisan.ui_accents: textured backgrounds, deckled dividers, layered cards
artisan.instructions: Combine organic shapes, textured paper effects, and editorial storytelling modules.
artisan.image_prompt: artisan studio photography, warm film tones, handcrafted details

midnight_glow.label: Midnight Glow
midnight_glow.description: Cinematic glassmorphism with cosmic gradients and luminous outlines.
midnight_glow.ui_accents: glassmorphism panels, starfield dots, animated glows
midnight_glow.instructions: Use deep space backgrounds, luminous outlines, and glass cards with neon borders.
midnight_glow.image_prompt: futuristic interface in deep space palette, glowing edges
